text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Nobody cares about "ratings" except YOU. How about you stop with that and make deductions based on what is best for the USA? Thanks for the moving words honoring all the Covid-19 dead...(I was being younger in cheek, you made an ASS of yourself AGAIN. https://t.co/N6FeRw1Sm8
